Lolll. Guess what. That fee isn't a fixed fee. They charge 20% of your money as 💀 withdrawal fee 😂 Go and read the reviews of their second app "Changera" then your eyes will open.
replyContent:
Hi Stories,
The minimum USDT you can deposit is 0.1 Usdt on the Tron & Eth network, however on withdrawal the minimum is $2 for Tron and $25 for Eth. Fiat withdrawal is a flat 200naira fee not percentage. Can you provide us your customer ID at support@bitmama.io, we would like to solve any challenge you might have had using Bitmama.
